bio:
DigiGrapes Technologies is a young and dynamic organization founded in early 2009 with a goal to achieve excellence in SW product engineering and services delivery

With our maturity in engineering tools, processes, technologies and business domain, we help our customers achieve faster turnaround in taking their ideas to market.

Key Advantages:

 Global Footprint –
           Engineering in India
           Sales, support & Liaison – USA, UK, Australia
 State of the Art infrastructure with cutting edge tools, technologies, processes and human resources
 Young and Dynamic startup advantage
 Flexible, Agile and Execution-Efficient
 Strong Leadership team with technical depth and deep business insights
 Strong technical pool with skills versatility
 Sustained value proposition with quality driven cost effectiveness

AGILE FLEXI COST – Baby steps to Giant Leap
This model plans the project as an estimated number of fixed cost & fixed scope iterations (Sprints). Each Sprint provides a pre-agreed scope within a pre-agreed cost at a pre-agreed quality norm. As project progresses, estimation on number of sprints is adjusted and becomes more accurate. This model offers flexi pull out and easy adaption to change with least risk

TIME & MATERIAL – Progress at your will
In this model, Client agrees to pay a pre-agreed fee for each resource or team and engages the resource/team as per will. This offers operating flexibility to projects where work scope is too dynamic to ascertain upfront

FIXED COST – You define, We deliver
In this model, Client agrees to pay a pre-agreed fixed fee for a very well defined scope. Any change in scope is handled as time & material cost. This offers a predictive cost advantage to usually small and specific objective projects

CAPTIVE CENTERS – Build, Operate & Transfer

abstrac: We Begin When You Stop, Begin When You Can't
bio:
After 5 Call Center had its start in New York City back in Jan 2007 under Jack&Gill Answers with 4 employees.  After5CallCenter currently employs over 75 people.
What can After5CallCenter Provide to your Business?
In this economy, the business that can last is the one that can respond to client need whenever it’s needed, answer client question whenever needed and provided the needed services whenever it is requested.  Having a constant presence is not only nice to have anymore; it’s become the standard and basic requirement from clients.  
After 5 Call Center as an extension of your business. Our agents are here to answer every call, email and chat 24/7.  Your callers should never know After 5 Call Center is answering. We can also support you with day-to-day administrative and bookkeeping task.
You can depend on our team to care about your customers and prospects as much as you do.

Availability
Monday to Saturday; 9am-8pm EST. 

Communication
Skype:
Email: alex@after5callcenter.com
Phone: 800-651-9539

Payment Method
Guru SafePay system

Feedback/Endorsement
Kindly take a moment to provide feedback when our project is completed. Referrals, recommendations, testimonials and endorsements within your network (where appropriate) are greatly appreciated.
I would be happy to provide positive feedback based on our mutually satisfactory relationships.

Guarantee policy-
We write a guarantee into each project description based on the scope of work. We stand by our service and look forward to the opportunity to exceed your expectations.
